sentences.sContent: First, simply, it was a matter of face, of reducing its pariah-state image —a tangible symbol of being welcomed back into the global community.
sentences.sContent_eng: First, simply, it was a matter of face, of reducing its pariah-state image —a tangible symbol of being welcomed back into the global community.
sentences.sCn: 首先，简单地说，这是面子问题，可以弱化它的贱民国家形象——一个欢迎它回归国际社会的切实象征。

sentences.sContent: He had been known as the ruthless leader of a pariah state, a butcher, a delusional man divorced from reality.
sentences.sContent_eng: He had been known as the ruthless leader of a pariah state, a butcher, a delusional man divorced from reality.
sentences.sCn: 他就是被人称为一个贱民国度的残忍领导人，一个屠夫，一个脱离实际只会妄想的男子汉。
